Method Detail

Same_Move_P

public boolean Same_Move_P(online.game.commonMove oth)
This is used to check for equivalent moves "as specified" not "as executed", so it should only compare those elements that are specified when the move is created.

Specified by:

shortMoveString

public java.lang.String shortMoveString()
construct an abbreviated move string, mainly for use in the game log. These don't have to be parseable, they're intended only to help humans understand the game record. The alternative method shortMoveText(online.game.commonCanvas) can be implemented to provide colored text or mixed text and icons.

Overrides:
shortMoveString in class online.game.commonMove

public lib.Text shortMoveText(online.game.commonCanvas v)
Overrides:
shortMoveText in class online.game.commonMove

shortMoveText

public lib.Text shortMoveText(HexGameViewer v)
shortMoveText lets you return colorized text or mixed text and graphics.

Parameters:
v -
Returns:
a Text object
See Also:
Text, TextGlyph, TextChunk

moveString

public java.lang.String moveString()
construct a move string for this move. These are the inverse of what are accepted by the constructors, and only secondarily human readable

Specified by:
moveString in class online.game.commonMove

longMoveString

public java.lang.String longMoveString()
longMoveString is used for sgf format records and can contain other information intended to be ignored in the normal course of play, for example human-readable information

Overrides:
longMoveString in class online.game.commonMove

toString
